precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop area.
expected_results: A context menu will appear, displaying options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will open, and the 'Themes' tab will be active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Themes" tab selected.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying the screen saver settings.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and select "None".
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will display "None" and the "Wait" time field will be cleared.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: A dropdown list of screen savers will appear. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab within the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the '3D FlowerBox' item in the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The '3D FlowerBox' screen saver will be selected. The 'Settings' and 'Preview' buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Apply" button is highlighted.
The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Power' button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open, displaying the current power settings. The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu will be set to 'After 20 mins'.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu should be open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" option will be set to "After 5 hours" and the dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close. The Windows XP desktop and taskbar will be visible.
